meanings.sent1: The unseared toast was warm and soft.
meanings.sent2: She preferred her steak unseared and juicy.
meanings.sent3: The unseared marshmallow refused to turn golden brown over the campfire.
meanings.sent4: His unseared skin felt like delicate silk against the rough fabric.
meanings.sent5: The unseared wood emitted a fresh, natural scent when the fire was lit.

meanings.definition: Not cauterized or sealed with heat
meanings.sent1: The unseared wound needed proper care to heal.
meanings.sent2: The unseared edges of the fabric frayed easily.
meanings.sent3: The unseared metal remained malleable and easy to bend.
meanings.sent4: Her unseared heart felt every emotion deeply.
meanings.sent5: The unseared steak sizzled on the grill, releasing its savory aroma.

meanings.definition: Not hardened or desensitized by experience or exposure
meanings.sent1: His unseared innocence made him believe in magic.
meanings.sent2: The unseared artist's emotions were raw and powerful.
meanings.sent3: The unseared explorer marveled at every new discovery.
meanings.sent4: Her unseared curiosity led her to ask endless questions.
meanings.sent5: The unseared mind absorbed every detail of the breathtaking view.
